main_definition: The Bahamas, officially known as the Commonwealth of The Bahamas, is a country consisting of an archipelago in the Atlantic Ocean.

meanings_and_examples.example: We're planning to spend our winter break at a luxury resort in the Bahamas.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An area of coral reefs and islands
meanings_and_examples.example: The Great Barrier Reef is not as famous as the barrier reef system that can be found in the Bahamas.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A colloquial term used to refer to something excessively luxurious or extravagant
meanings_and_examples.example: His yacht is so fancy, it's like he lives on his own private version of the Bahamas.
